description: Capacity Strengthening for Local Human Development at micro-regional level

subproject.description:
The project aims to foster development and the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs) through capacity building of local public administration and by involving civil society in selected municipalities of Brazil and is based on the premise that sound local policies will lead to better managed and more equitable development process. 

The project represents an innovation in terms of the recipient of the services and types of products and services delivered to the local beneficiaries of the project. The project will be implemented in pilot municipalities that have demonstrated interest in and commitment to identify development issues and needs and later on implement and monitor progress towards set objectives.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: BRA/08/022/1 Capacity Develop

subproject.corporate outcome: Civil society, including civil society organizations and voluntary associations, and the private sector contribute to the MDGs in support of national planning strategies and policies
